concreteRc.step-2-description: Fill in all the fields bellow
concreteRc.step-3-description: Select the type of rupture obtained and upload the graph file generated during the pressing process.
concreteRc.step-4-description: These are the results of your experiment. Remember to save the experiment to be able to access it later.
rc.error.minReads: It's not possible to delete. Minimum achieved.
concrete.essays.conic-column: Type C: Column with cone formation
concrete.essays.baseRuptures: Type F: Cracks at the base of capping
concrete.essays.topRuptures: Type F: Cracks at the top of capping
concrete.essays.multipleTopRuptures: Type G: Multiple cracks at the top of capping
concrete.essays.errors.invalid-diammHeig: The ratio of the average diameters divided by the height must be greater than or equal to 2.06.
concrete.essays.errors.connection-error: An error occurred while connecting to the server. Please try again later.
concrete.essays.errors.tolerance-not-per: The tolerance value is not allowed.
